Package eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.GNN

Class GNNMiner

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.SocialGraphMiner
      • eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.GNN.GNNMiner
  • public class GNNMiner
extends SocialGraphMiner
    This class provides an implementation of a SocialGraphMiner based on a Graph Neural Network (GNN) architecture. Its parameters can be adjusted using a number of setter methods.
    Author:
    Emmanouil Krasanakis

    • Nested Class Summary

      The learning rate (default is 1) from which GNNMiner training starts.
      GNNMiner setLearningRateDegradation​(double learningRateDegradation)
      Performs a fixed degradation of the learning rate over training epochs by multiplyng the latter with a given factor (default is 0.95) after each epoch.
      GNNMiner setMaxTrainingEpoch​(int maxEpoch)
      Limits the number of training epochs (default is 1000) over which to train the GNNMiner.
      GNNMiner setMinTrainingRelativeLoss​(double convergenceRelativeLoss)
      When the GNNMiner is being trained, training stops at epochs where abs(previous epoch loss - this epoch loss) < convergenceRelativeLoss*(this epoch loss) where losses are weighted cross entropy ones.
      GNNMiner setRegularizationAbsorbsion​(double regularizationAbsorbsion)
      Multiplies regularization tensors with this value before setting them as regularization.
      GNNMiner setRegularizationWeight​(double regularizationWeight)
      The regularization weight (default 0.1) to apply during training of the GNNMiner.
      GNNMiner setTrainingExampleDegradation​(double trainingExampleDegradation)
      Degrades example weights each time a new one is generated through newInteraction(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction, java.lang.String, eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.SocialGraphMiner.InteractionType) by calling ContextTrainingExampleData.degrade(double, double) to multiply previous weights with the given degradation factor.
      GNNMiner setTrainingExampleRemovalThreshold​(double trainingExampleRemovalThreshold)
      Sets the threshold at which old training examples are removed (default is 0.01).

      • GNNMiner

        public GNNMiner​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.ContextualEgoNetwork contextualEgoNetwork)
        Instantiates a GNNMiner on a given contextual ego network.
        Parameters:
        contextualEgoNetwork - The contextual ego network on which the miner runs and stores information.

    • Method Detail

      • setLearningRate

        public GNNMiner setLearningRate​(double learningRate)
        The learning rate (default is 1) from which GNNMiner training starts. Training restarts on each newInteraction(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction, java.lang.String, eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.SocialGraphMiner.InteractionType) from this value and can be potentially be adapted by setLearningRateDegradation(double) over training epochs.
        Parameters:
        learningRate - The learning rate to restart from.
        Returns:
        this GNNMiner instance.
        See Also:
        GNNNodeData.setLearningRate(double)

      • setEdgePointsLearningMultiplier

                                                double outgoing)

      • setLearningRateDegradation

        public GNNMiner setLearningRateDegradation​(double learningRateDegradation)
        Performs a fixed degradation of the learning rate over training epochs by multiplyng the latter with a given factor (default is 0.95) after each epoch.
        Parameters:
        learningRateDegradation - The rate at which learning rate degrades.
        Returns:
        this GNNMiner instance.
        See Also:
        setLearningRate(double)

      • setRegularizationWeight

        public GNNMiner setRegularizationWeight​(double regularizationWeight)
        The regularization weight (default 0.1) to apply during training of the GNNMiner. This weight ensures that training converges around given areas of the embedding space.
        Parameters:
        regularizationWeight - The regularization weight to set.
        Returns:
        this GNNMiner instance.
        See Also:
        GNNNodeData.setRegularizationWeight(double), setRegularizationAbsorbsion(double)

      • setRegularizationAbsorbsion

        public GNNMiner setRegularizationAbsorbsion​(double regularizationAbsorbsion)
        Multiplies regularization tensors with this value before setting them as regularization. Value of 1 (default) produces regularization of calculated alter embeddings towards the embeddings calculated on alter devices. Value of 0 produce regularization towards zero, which effectively limits the embedding norm to the approximate order of magnitude 1/weight, where weight is the value set to setRegularizationWeight(double).
        Parameters:
        absorbsion -
        Returns:
        this GNNMiner instance.

      • setMaxTrainingEpoch

        public GNNMiner setMaxTrainingEpoch​(int maxEpoch)
        Limits the number of training epochs (default is 1000) over which to train the GNNMiner.
        Parameters:
        maxEpoch - The maximum epoch at which to train.
        Returns:
        this GNNMiner instance.

      • setMinTrainingRelativeLoss

        public GNNMiner setMinTrainingRelativeLoss​(double convergenceRelativeLoss)
        When the GNNMiner is being trained, training stops at epochs where abs(previous epoch loss - this epoch loss) < convergenceRelativeLoss*(this epoch loss) where losses are weighted cross entropy ones. Default is 0.001.
        Parameters:
        convergenceRelativeLoss - The relative loss at which to stop training.
        Returns:
        this GNNMiner instance.

      • setTrainingExampleDegradation

        public GNNMiner setTrainingExampleDegradation​(double trainingExampleDegradation)
        Degrades example weights each time a new one is generated through newInteraction(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction, java.lang.String, eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.SocialGraphMiner.InteractionType) by calling ContextTrainingExampleData.degrade(double, double) to multiply previous weights with the given degradation factor. Default is 0.5.
        Parameters:
        trainingExampleDegradation - The factor with which to multiply each 8previous example weight
        Returns:
        this GNNMiner instance.
        See Also:
        setTrainingExampleRemovalThreshold(double)

      • setTrainingExampleRemovalThreshold

        public GNNMiner setTrainingExampleRemovalThreshold​(double trainingExampleRemovalThreshold)
        Sets the threshold at which old training examples are removed (default is 0.01). Basically, if the degradation set by set by setTrainingExampleDegradation(double) remains constant throughout training iterations, training examples are removed if degradation^n < trainingExampleRemovalThreshold where n the number of (positive) examples provided after the examined one with newInteraction(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction, java.lang.String, eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.SocialGraphMiner.InteractionType).
        Parameters:
        trainingExampleRemovalThreshold - The weight threshold at which to remove GNN training examples which is passed as the second argument to ContextTrainingExampleData.degrade(double, double) calls.
        Returns:
        this GNNMiner instance.

      • setDeniability

        public GNNMiner setDeniability​(double plausibleDeniability,
                               double differentialPrivacy)
        Enables plausible deniability and differential privacy handling by permuting the ego and its alter's parameters with a random noise proportional to their norm. Zero values (default) ensure no privacy concerns but more exact computations for other devices. The user's device would perform predictions depending on the privacy settings of their alters.
        Parameters:
        plausibleDeniability - The permutation of the ego's parameters.
        differentialPrivacy - The permutation of the neighbor's parameters.
        Returns:
        this GNNMiner instance.

      • newInteraction

        public void newInteraction​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction interaction,
                           java.lang.String neighborModelParameters,
                           SocialGraphMiner.InteractionType interactionType)
        Description copied from class: SocialGraphMiner
        Makes the graph miner aware that a user received an interaction from another user with SocialGraphMiner.getModelParameters(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction).
        Specified by:
        newInteraction in class SocialGraphMiner
        Parameters:
        interaction - A new interaction the user initiates expressed in terms of the contextual ego network
        neighborModelParameters - The neighbor parameters. May be null for when interactionType==SEND.
        interactionType - The type of the interaction (SEND, RECEIVE or RECEIVE_REPLY corresponds to acknowledging the receive).

      • predictNewInteraction

        public double predictNewInteraction​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context context,
                                    eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Node destinationNode)
        Description copied from class: SocialGraphMiner
        Predicts the weight of performing a SEND interaction between the given context's ego and a destination node. This method should typically return values in the [0,1] range, where higher values correspond to more likely interactions.
        Specified by:
        predictNewInteraction in class SocialGraphMiner
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which to perform the prediction.
        destinationNode - The destination node of the interaction.
        Returns:
        The weight of performing the interaction (higher values are more likely).
